subject: Re: Is Junit-based testing REALLY possible for commercial software development ?
msgSnippet: Hi all, After I posted the question to this mailing list,I got so many replies from all you guys. I think I ve got what I want to learn and decide to start
messageBody:
Hi all,

After I posted the question to this mailing list,I got so many replies
from all you guys. I think I've got what I want to learn and decide to
start PRACTICING right now.

Here is the summary of what I learned:

* automated unit testing is possible for commericial software development.
* for experienced testers, the time should be shorter.
* for team new to unit testing, there may be some prodctivity drop at
the begining. Like the first 3-6 months.
* it is best to consider the extra effort, like learning curve,
especially at the project planning phase.
* and lots more ...

Thanks to all who ever helped.

Cheers,
- Frank
